description: Elevate your marketing strategy with AskCory.ai, the AI-driven platform that empowers you to craft tailored plans, and access benchmarks in minutes.
title: AskCory - Marketing Strategy and Tactics
introduction: AskCory.ai is an AI-powered marketing assistant that helps users generate strategic tactics, action plans, and content assets in a fraction of the time. It aims to streamline marketing processes and provide personalized marketing strategies based on industry benchmarks.
features: Generate strategic tactics, action plans, and content assets
Personalized marketing strategies based on industry benchmarks
pricing: Start for free, pay as you go, or subscribe with options like Starter ($19.70/month) for startups and SMEs, Professional ($57.50/month) for marketing consultants and freelancers, and Custom plan for agencies and enterprises.
targetPeople: Marketers, startups, SMEs, marketing consultants, freelancers, agencies, and enterprises

faqs.question: What are the pricing options available?
faqs.answer: Users can choose from a free trial, pay as you go, or subscription plans like Starter, Professional, and Custom.

faqs.question: Who can benefit from AskCory.ai?
faqs.answer: AskCory.ai is beneficial for marketers, startups, SMEs, marketing consultants, freelancers, agencies, and enterprises looking to streamline their marketing processes and improve ROI.

faqs.question: What features does AskCory.ai offer?
faqs.answer: AskCory.ai offers features such as generating strategic tactics, personalized marketing strategies, AI-generated actions, SEO-optimized blog post creation, and social media post generation.
